function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited dine-in options and restrictive social distancing rules","Impact":"Reduced opportunities for customers to consume food in familiar spaces, potentially leading to dissatisfaction and frustration","Mitigation":"Implementing creative solutions for outdoor dining, providing alternative spaces for customers to enjoy their meals","Technologies":"Outdoor seating arrangements, mobile ordering and payment systems","People":"Customers","Owner":"Food truck owners"},{"Description":"Customers improvising to recreate the consumption experience outside their homes","Impact":"Increased risk of social interaction and potential spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Encouraging safe practices for outdoor dining, providing guidelines for customer interactions","Technologies":"Contactless payment systems, digital menus, outdoor seating layouts","People":"Customers","Owner":"Food truck owners"}]}
